caption.p: (A) Structure of coronavirus and (B) its replication: (Ab: Antibody; DPP4: Dipeptidase Peptidyl 4; TMPRSS2: Transmembrane Protease, Serine 2; PL pro: Papain-like Protease; 3CL pro: 3-C-like Protease; RdRp: RNA dependent and RNA polymerase; nsp: Non-structural protein, ORF: open reading frame, ACE2: Angiotensin converting enzyme, CD13: human aminopeptidase N).Entry targets: (I) Spike protein (RBD, Fusion intermediates); (II) Receptors; a. DPP4/CD26 for MERS, b. ACE2 for SARS and HCoV-NL63, c. 9-O-Acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HU1, d. CD13 for HCoV-229E (III) Surface proteases: TMPRSS2. (IV) Endosomal proteases. Polyprotein processing targets: a. Papain-like protease (PL pro), b. 3C-like protease (3CL pro). Replicase targets: a. ADP-ribose-1'-phosphatase (nsp3), b. RNA-dependent and RNA polymerase (nsp12), c. Helicase (nsp13), d.Exonuclease (nsp14), e. Endoribonuclease (nsp15), f. 2'- O-methyltransferase.
